model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Parent, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker B: Never boring you will keep styling it all sorts of interesting styles im sure.  Yes i would be lovely to be your guide for the day out in Greece.  Bring some decent walking boots and some sun cream, its a different heat out there but your tan is probably topped up with going to the beach each day.

[MEMORY]
1. Speaker B does not have any trips planned but expresses interest in visiting Greece for the history and Greek mythology.
2. Speaker A is fascinated by the architecture of Italy and enjoys studying history, especially through reading and watching documentaries.
3. Speaker A is planning to travel to Italy alone for Spring Break and has friends from Europe meeting up with them.
4. Speaker B has been to Italy in the past and enjoyed the food there.
5. Speaker B enjoys Greek mythology and did a case study on Poseidon, the God of the Sea, Earthquakes, and Horses.
6. Speaker A is going to a hair appointment for their birthday.

Bring some decent walking boots and some sun cream, its a different heat out there but your tan is probably topped up with going to the beach each day.

raw_prediction: Haha, I'll definitely have to switch up my hairstyles again soon! Thanks for the tips on Greece - I'll make sure to pack accordingly. I can't wait to explore all the history and mythology with you as my guide. It's going to be an amazing trip!
